attributes.action: We clamour for COVID-19 vaccinations to be delivered 24/7.
attributes.additional_details: This is is an urgent matter of national and international importance.
attributes.background: This responds to a Downing Street assertion that there is "'No clamour' for Covid vaccinations after 8pm". This petition is to show that we want Government to recognise that most people really want to have COVID-19 vaccinations delivered as quickly as possible.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197
